description:
Freelancing 101 is a basic course for people who have always wanted to get into freelancing, but just never knew how. This class breaks everything down into bite-sized chunks to help you set up a business without going broke or higher a bunch of expensive consultants. It provides detailed explanations as to how to find and manage clients, how to market your business, and even how to manage your money. It lists tons of useful websites, resources, and web applications to get your business up and running without breaking a sweat.

Here are just a few things you will learn in the course.

How to find and manage clients

How to structure your business to suit your lifestyle

How to set your rates

How to select a target market

How to market your business

How to build your portfolio

If that sounds interesting, go ahead and sign up!
title: Freelancing for Beginners
